DOC.brief_summary: Detect plasma Hsp90α concentration of colorectal cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign colorectal diseases patients.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial of Quantitative Detection Kit for Hsp90α in Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Detect plasma Hsp90α concentration of colorectal cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign colorectal diseases patients, validate accuracy, specificity and sensitivity of Hsp90α kit.
DOC.criteria: colorectal cancer patients, healthy volunteers, benign colorectal diseases patients Patients who previously accepted radiotherapy
